QuestData.Title: The Final Step
QuestData.Description: We have Morkurk cornered. He's all ours now. Use the scroll once you engage Morkurk...$B$B...and enjoy the blizzard of your forces raining down on his head.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Witch Lord Morkurk and retrieve the Arcane Nexus in Gordal Fortress.
